This "works" 100%

The problem is in doSave(...) of InputContext, what is happening is somehow we are being disconnected from the documentProvider when the fragment project is deleted. 

Since this isn't a fairly common workflow, we can consider for 3.3.X or come up with a temporary solution to ensure that we have a handle to a document before we try to save.

I just tried this in 3.4M2 and this appears to be working.  I believe this is due to the fix for bug 201369.  It appears in that bug that we were being a little sloppy when it came to registering/unregistering our InputContexts.  I imagine the deletion of the fragment project caused the Product Editor to unregister since we use to not do as much checking as we should.

The good news is, it should work as designed with no need to check for nulls :)
